item.description:
There are Tax Day Tea Parties happening at the four locations below.
————-
City: Hartford
When: April 15, 12:00 pm - 2:00 pm
Where: North Steps of State Capitol, Capitol Avenue
————-
City: New Haven
When: April 15, 11:00 am - 1:00 pm
Where: Long Wharf, I-95, Exit 46
————-
City: Norwich
When: April 15, 3:00 pm - 6:00 pm
Where: Marina Area Near Gazebo
_______

Greenwich Tax Day Tea Party
April 15, 2009
3:00 pm - 5:00 pm
TOWN HALL, Field Point Road,
Greenwich, CT

Contact:
Matt Lechner
mattlechner@optonline.net
item.name: Tea Parties at CT Cities ! Hartford, Norwich, Greenwich, New Haven
